optimization.data_augmentation.ssda.translate¶

optimization.data_augmentation.ssda.translate(image: tensorflow.python.framework.ops.Tensor, translations) → tensorflow.python.framework.ops.Tensor¶

Translates image(s) by provided vectors. Args:

image: An image Tensor of type uint8. translations: A vector or matrix representing [dx dy].

Returns:

The translated version of the image.
